job.remarks:
ABEI error log is by default only saved for 10 days.
This job stores only error messages in table _AB_entity_results in database ABSC_Data for ABEI job 330. This is only used for throubleshooting.

step.datasource:
Insert into [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] ( [id] ,[runid] ,[jobid] ,[jobstepid] ,[ExactProduct] ,[TargetServer] ,[TargetDB] ,[Entity] ,[Keyvalue] ,[Action] ,[HeaderID] ,[UniqueKey] ,[rowstatus] ,[NewKeyvalue] ,[errormessage] ,[syscreated] ,[sysmodified] ,[RecordValue] ,[ReferenceValue] ) Select r.[id] ,r.[runid] ,r.[jobid] ,r.[jobstepid] ,r.[ExactProduct] ,r.[TargetServer] ,r.[TargetDB] ,r.[Entity] ,r.[Keyvalue] ,r.[Action] ,r.[HeaderID] ,r.[UniqueKey] ,r.[rowstatus] ,r.[NewKeyvalue] ,r.[errormessage] ,r.[syscreated] ,r.[sysmodified] ,r.[RecordValue] ,r.[ReferenceValue]
from [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] r with(nolock) left outer join [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] cr with(nolock) on r.id = cr.id
where 1=1 and r.jobid = 330 and r.rowstatus = -1 and cr.id is null
